name: Portola Hotel & Spa
description: Portola Hotel & Spa is a luxury waterfront hotel on Monterey's Old Fisherman's Wharf. Full-service spa, fine dining, and access to Monterey Peninsula golf courses including Pebble Beach and Spyglass Hill.
shortDescription: Luxury waterfront hotel on Monterey's Old Fisherman's Wharf with access to Pebble Beach area golf.
highlights: Waterfront location on Old Fisherman's Wharf
Minutes from Pebble Beach and Spyglass Hill

faqs.question: Why is a Monterey hotel listed on a Reno-Tahoe golf site?
faqs.answer: Golf the High Sierra offers extended packages that include Monterey/Pebble Beach courses like Poppy Hills and Bayonet & Black Horse. Portola Hotel is the ideal base for these coastal courses.

faqs.question: How far is Portola Hotel from Pebble Beach?
faqs.answer: About 10 minutes to Pebble Beach Golf Links. Poppy Hills, Spyglass Hill, and Bayonet & Black Horse are all within 15-20 minutes.

faqs.question: Does Portola have a spa?
faqs.answer: Yes — the Spa on the Plaza offers full-service treatments including massages, facials, body wraps, and a fitness center.
